divs: Sighting Detailsas I was sleeping in my tent I heard a scratching noise and I looked out and saw the ufo. I thought it was mars but it was too big and bright so I concluded it was a ufo. it was about 300 feet off the ground absolutely still and about 250-400 feet wide it also was a fiery red. I managed to take one photo which is very fuzzy. after it disappeared by fading away at this time I had a ringing in my ears and I was puzzled. I reported it but everyone thought I was crazy. so I came here.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Laurel
There were no other sightings in Laurel on or around July 12th 2005
Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Fireball, Sphere, Other, Unknown
